Title: Twilight Zone: The Movie
Director: Joe Dante, John Landis, George Miller, Steven Spielberg
Writer: John Landis, George Clayton Johnson (screenplay by), Richard Matheson (screenplay by), Melissa Mathison (screenplay by), George Clayton Johnson (story by), Richard Matheson (screenplay by), Jerome Bixby (based on a story by), Richard Matheson (based on a story by), Rod Serling (inspired by "The Twilight Zone" created by)
Actors: Dan Aykroyd, Albert Brooks, Vic Morrow, Doug McGrath
Plot: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.
